thing-type.label: 123580 Wall Plug Dimmer
thing-type.description: Wall Plug Dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis is a wall plug dimmer that can be placed between a schuko wall outlet and electric devices, plugged in by cord. It can dim all incandescent lights, high voltage halogen lamps and transformers operated low voltage lamps without any restriction. Special optimization functions support the dimming of the majority of dimmable LED lights and Compact Fluorescent Lights (CFLs). The device is IP20 rated and can therefore only be used in dry environments. The device offers a Baby-Dim Function which dims down a lamp from a defined level into another defined level in a longer but also definable period (e.g. 20 minutes). An automatic Light-Off function and programmable dimming and switching behavior makes the device a very flexible tool for inhouse lighting.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt Inclusion and Exclusion are confirmed by a tripple click of the button. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt Inclusion and Exclusion are confirmed by a tripple click of the button. </p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Automatic switch off time
parameter.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time (in seconds)

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: RF Off command
parameter.description: RF Off command<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function:</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtIgnore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics;</li&gt <li&gtSwitch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time. Button off click will still work (if button operations are not disabled).</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

options.option: Switch on if load is off else switch off

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Speed for fast dimming
parameter.description: Speed for fast dimming<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to dim on button presses and Set command (if it has no duration specified).</p&gt <p&gtIf not 0, dimming will be done smoothly to preserve bulb life.</p&gt <p&gtSet in 10ms steps.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Speed for slow dimming
parameter.description: Speed for slow dimming<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to dim on button presses and Set command (if it has no duration specified).</p&gt <p&gtIf not 0, dimming will be done smoothly to preserve bulb life.</p&gt <p&gtSet in 10ms steps.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Behavior when ON received
parameter.description: Behavior when ON received<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines the dim level on command 'ON'. On default he dimmer restores last dim level.</p&gt <p&gtThis parameter allows configuring the maximum level on second On command (if already On) or to always switch on to maximum level.</p&gt</p&gt

options.option: If on already, set to maximum

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Baby dimming time
parameter.description: Baby dimming time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to dim on double click Off button for Baby-Dim function. This function works only if the load is operated by single press and hold button action.</p&gt <p&gt<strong&gtIf enabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands</strong&gt</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Baby target light level
parameter.description: Baby target level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTarget percentage level on which to stop while executing Baby Dimming. Can be 0 to completely switch off the light.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Baby target time level
parameter.description: Baby target level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTypical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks.</p&gt <p&gtSet in 10ms steps.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: Limit minimum light level
parameter.description: Minimum level should be greater than maximum.

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: Limit maximum light level
parameter.description: Maximum level should be greater than minimum. Set to 0 to act as a switch.

parameter.name: config_19_1
parameter.label: 19: Dim Level on 'Switch On'
parameter.description: Dim Level on 'Switch On'<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtdefines how the dimmer hall react on a simple ON Command.</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to restore last level, otherwise sets dim level.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 51: Pause before pulse
parameter.description: Pause before pulse<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt<strong&gtNB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! </strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtFor dimmable LEDs and CFL with bypass use value 1.</p&gt <p&gtFor other bulbs use default value.</p&gt</p&gt
